text: Granthadavare, ido nim'ma balige nam'ma dutaru bandu bittiddare mattu nimage spasta bodhane niduttiddare. Devadutara agamana saraniyu (bahukala) sthagitagonda karana nivu, suvarte niduva athava eccarike niduva yaru nam'ma balige baralillavendu helabaradendu, ido nim'ma balige bandu bittiddare â€“ suvarte niduvavaru mattu eccarike niduvavaru. Allahanantu ellavannu madalu saktanagiddane
